title: Best Pig Breeds For Commercial Pig Farming

tasks.task: Identify the best pig breeds for commercial farming.
subtasks: Ensure knowledge of pig breed genetics.
Mention the large white breed as a top choice for commercial farming.
Highlight the landrace breed as another excellent option.
Discuss the Hampshire breed as a viable alternative.
Introduce the TN70 breed as a cross between large white and landrace.
Mention the Camboro breed for its size and breeding capabilities.
Recommend the Duroc breed for cross-breeding programs.
Note the Piatran breed as a rising star in the market.
Emphasize the importance of pure breeds over diminished breeds.
